com.tailf.jnc
Interface Transport

All Known Implementing Classes:
SSHSession, TCPSession
public interface Transport

A NETCONF transport interface. This interface can be used to write custom NETCONF transport mechanisms. The NetconfSession constructor takes a transport mechanism to be responsible for the actual sending and receiving of NETCONF protocol messages over the wire. SSHSession and TCPSession implements the Transport interface.

See Also:
SSHSession, TCPSession

flush

void flush()

This method furthermore flushes the transport output stream buffer.
